body.name: Hasbro Marvel Legends Series Spider-Man, Captain America: Civil War Collectible 6 Inch Action Figures, Marvel Legends Action Figures
body.stockDetail: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 2 mins
features: MCU-INSPIRED SPIDER-MAN: This Spider-Man action figure is inspired by the character's appearance in Marvel Studios’ Captain America: Civil War. Makes a great addition to any Marvel Legends action figures collection
MARVEL COMICS-INSPIRED DESIGN: Toys feature design and detail based on the Marvel Universe and are great for display in a Marvel collection.

LOOK FOR OTHER MARVEL TOYS: Be on the lookout for other figures and gear to imagine brave heroes defending the world from evil villains! Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.
body.description: With over 80 years of comic book history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. From figures to vehicles to roleplay toys, Marvel toys offer character-inspired products for every type of fan, from adult collectors to kids. Imagine adventures with characters like Iron Man, Captain America, Spider-Man, Black Panther, and more! With Marvel figures and roleplay toys, fans can re-enact battles with their favorite heroes and play their part in saving the galaxy! Additional figures and roleplay toys each sold separately. Subject to availability. Copyright 2019 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience Marvel Legends! For 20 years, the Marvel Legends series has brought the iconic characters and stories of Marvel to life for fans and collectors around the world with premium action figures drawn from across the Marvel Entertainment multiverse. Bring the excitement and wonder of the Marvel Universe to your collection with figures from the Marvel Legends Series!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Epic Marvel Showdown: Spider-Man from Captain America: Civil War!
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the Marvel Hasbro Legends Series Spider-Man from Captain America: Civil War to my collection, and I'm thoroughly impressed with the level of detail and quality that this figure brings to the table.First and foremost, the attention to detail in capturing Spider-Man's appearance from the iconic Civil War film is commendable. The sculpting of the costume, the web patterns, and the expressive eyes are spot-on, making this figure a mini-replica of Tom Holland's portrayal of the beloved superhero. The paintwork is vibrant, with accurate colors that enhance the overall realism of the figure.Articulation is a key factor for any action figure, and Spider-Man doesn't disappoint. The figure boasts a wide range of movement, allowing for dynamic and acrobatic poses. The joints are sturdy, providing stability even in more challenging positions. This articulation adds a layer of playability and creativity for collectors who enjoy setting up action scenes or recreating memorable moments from the movie.The accessory count is another strong suit of this figure. With multiple interchangeable hands, web-slinging effects, and an alternative unmasked head sculpt, Hasbro has gone above and beyond to provide fans with various display options. The inclusion of a Captain America shield also adds a nice touch, allowing collectors to recreate the epic airport battle scene from the film.Packaging is collector-friendly, featuring character-specific artwork and a window display that showcases the figure without compromising its integrity. The box also includes information about other figures in the series, enticing collectors to explore and expand their Marvel Legends collection.In terms of value for money, the Marvel Hasbro Legends Series Spider-Man from Captain America: Civil War offers a fantastic balance between quality and price. Whether you're a die-hard Marvel fan, a Spider-Man enthusiast, or a general collector, this figure is a standout addition that beautifully captures the essence of one of the most iconic moments in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Son loves it!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 10-year-olds Christmas present and he’s been making stop motion videos with it ever since. He loves his toy and now wants me to order every single one I can find from the collection. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what was expected
reviews.reviewText: Well packaged and it is exactly what my son expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks exactly like in the listing pictures, could be more detailed and accurate to how it looks in the movie, but it's just OK. Not sure if this is a reprint figure and I might be biased because this is only the second Legends Series figure I've ever bought, and comparing it to the newest last swing from No Way Home. Both are the same price, so it's kinda curious how different they are in quality.
